# 土系魔法

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tuxi-mofa
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tuxi-mofa
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tuxi-mofa
tuxi-mofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tuxi-mofa
tuxi-mofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
